page.title: 17EDUCATION IN BROCKWORTH
page.content: "I attended a 900 pupil,11-18 age-range mixed comprehensive school.I am 16 years old and leave on March 29th.I am doing 2 exams in English and hope to get good grades.{When I leave} I have a part-time job to go to in a cafe.Then I may go on a {YTS} scheme but I hope to join the army". An 11 year old says that there is a big difference between {junior and senior schools} in that the comprehensive pupils have different teachers for different subjects.He says"In the juniors you have one teacher and have to learn all the subjects but in the seniors you can specialise". A teacher says of his mid-June bike ride home from school while going up Coopers Hill that he passed a trailer in a lay-by selling garden gnomes- "Ideal Gnome Exhibition" said the sign.
